name: FLEURS DE GARDENIA
description: Translucent, delicate, ethereal, stimulating, bright, romantic. A blissful return to love's first blossoming, crafted by two generations of the House of Creed. A pure, gentle, dreamlike reality of fluttering hearts and soaring spirits. Sumptuous notes chosen by the young generation of the House of Creed become the master perfumer's portrait of how love wasâ€¦and can be again.
